Test Summary: Validate that an administrator user can login successfully and is redirected to the right page.
Result: The application main page is shown to the user whitout any visible error.

Action: Click on the login button on the top right corner of the app.
Result: A login form pops up with two fields: Username and Password, a "Login" button, an option for the "forget password" and a ccancel button.
The word "Admin" appear in the Username input
Password "Pass123" appear in the password input form
Main page reloads and we can see the login details in the top right corner the app.
